DOC.brief_summary: This prospective observational study investigate predictive value virological response peginterferon/ribavirin treatment-naive patient chronic hepatitis C. Patients treat Pegasys ( peg-interferon alpha 2a ) Copegus ( ribavirin ) prescribe physician . Data collect 72 week .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Pegasys Copegus Treatment-Naive Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /=18 year age Diagnosis chronic hepatitis C infection Coinfection human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) and/or hepatitis B Patients previously treat peginterferon/ribavirin Participation another clinical study within 30 prior study start ML25544
